      public ImageService()

  • Method Details

    • saveImage

      public ImageEntity saveImage(org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile file)
      Saves an image to the database.

      This method receives an image file, extracts relevant information such as the file name, content type, and byte data, then creates an ImageEntity object and saves it to the database using the imageDao. If there is an error during the file processing or saving, an exception is logged and rethrown as a runtime exception.

      Parameters:
      file - the image file to be saved
      Returns:
      the saved ImageEntity object
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if there is an error saving the image to the database

    • getImageById

      public Optional<ImageEntity> getImageById(Long id)
      Retrieves an image from the database by its ID.

      This method attempts to fetch an ImageEntity object from the database using the provided ID. If the image is found, it returns an Optional containing the image. If an error occurs during the fetch process, it logs the error and throws a runtime exception.

      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the image to be retrieved
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the found ImageEntity if present, or an empty Optional if not found
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if there is an error fetching the image from the database

    • getImageByName

      public Optional<ImageEntity> getImageByName(String name)
      Retrieves an image from the database by its name.

      This method attempts to fetch an ImageEntity object from the database using the provided name. If the image is found, it returns an Optional containing the image. If an error occurs during the fetch process, it logs the error and throws a runtime exception.

      Parameters:
      name - the name of the image to be retrieved
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the found ImageEntity if present, or an empty Optional if not found
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if there is an error fetching the image from the database

    • removeImage

      @Transactional public void removeImage(Long imageId)
      Removes an image from the database by its ID.

      This method first deletes any relationships between the image and products in the product_images table by calling imageDao#deleteFromProductImagesByImageID(Long). Afterward, it deletes the image from the image table using the provided image ID.

      This operation is performed within a transaction to ensure that both deletions are successful and consistent. If any part of the process fails, the transaction is rolled back.

      Parameters:
      imageId - the ID of the image to be removed

    • getAllImages

      public List<ImageEntity> getAllImages()
      Retrieves all images stored in the database. This method fetches all images from the imageDao repository. If an error occurs during the retrieval process, a RuntimeException is thrown.
      Returns:
      A List of ImageEntity objects representing all stored images.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if an error occurs while retrieving the images.
